item.title: FNMA
item.description: score:14 Chances: Fannie Mae’s February 2024 Monthly Summary report indicates positive year-to-date activities for its gross mortgage portfolio and interest rate risk measures. The company’s recognition by the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency for its energy-efficiency contributions further highlights its positive impact on the housing sector.
